ing: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans black-eyed peas, drained and rinsed
des: "A delicious party dip with beans, tomatoes, onions, and lots of diced avocado.  A variation on 'Texas Caviar'; one bite and you won't leave the bowl.  Serve with 'scoop' tortilla chips."
ins: In a large bowl, mix black-eyed peas, tomatoes, sweet onion, jalapeno peppers, Italian dressing, and cayenne pepper. Stir in the avocados just before serving.
